message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,350,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is quite high. I could meet you halfway from our previous offers. How about $1,275,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $1,200,000 again? I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
